name: part_023
file: tmp_【5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY】The Story Thus Far - featuring HoloEN! #5YearsOfMori [MryxToVvJO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_023.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope speaks to the viewers, wrapping up the 5th anniversary stream and introducing the final song.
Performance of the song 'Scuffed Up Age' by Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, and Cecilia Immergreen.

subtitles.original: Let's watch it live.
subtitles.english: Let's watch it live.

subtitles.original: And um, share it around. I don't know, if you want, if you like it.
subtitles.english: And um, share it around. I don't know, if you want, if you like it.

subtitles.original: Um, but I still have one last song memory to replay in my mind here in this beautiful area.
subtitles.english: Um, but I still have one last song memory to replay in my mind here in this beautiful area.

subtitles.original: So shall we run it? The last song of today.
subtitles.english: So shall we run it? The last song of today.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, Dead Beats.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, Dead Beats.

subtitles.original: Catch you on the flip side. There might be an after-credits scene.
subtitles.english: Catch you on the flip side. There might be an after-credits scene.

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original:
Scuffed Up Age
Lyrics by Mori Calliope / Camellia
Music by Camellia
subtitles.english:
Scuffed Up Age
Lyrics by Mori Calliope / Camellia
Music by Camellia

subtitles.original: Ha-ah-ah... La-la-la...
subtitles.english: Ha-ah-ah... La-la-la...

subtitles.original: Lost in thoughts, a frosted frame of mind,
subtitles.english: Lost in thoughts, a frosted frame of mind,

subtitles.original: Honest to God, it's just not our time.
subtitles.english: Honest to God, it's just not our time.

subtitles.original: Promises flawed by cosmic design,
subtitles.english: Promises flawed by cosmic design,

subtitles.original: コレクティブで手を取り合いたい
subtitles.english: I want to hold hands in the collective,

subtitles.original: でもな、無駄なあがきさせない
subtitles.english: But hey, I won't let it be a futile struggle.

subtitles.original: Coming of age, the stage doesn't light up,
subtitles.english: Coming of age, the stage doesn't light up,

subtitles.original: Just right away they told us it might have.
subtitles.english: Just right away they told us it might have.

subtitles.original: 夢はもう、諦めます
subtitles.english: I'm already giving up on my dreams.

subtitles.original: The cynical mind says why'd you try?
subtitles.english: The cynical mind says why'd you try?

subtitles.original: Why not give up and play the bad guy?
subtitles.english: Why not give up and play the bad guy?

subtitles.original: わかってるさ
subtitles.english: I know.

subtitles.original: 運命が波立てながら
subtitles.english: While fate is making waves,

subtitles.original: あなたの元へするのなら
subtitles.english: If I'm heading towards you,

subtitles.original: 崩れ落ちそうな体
subtitles.english: This body that feels like it's collapsing,

subtitles.original: 抱きしめるから
subtitles.english: I will hold you close.

subtitles.original: We choose to know
subtitles.english: We choose to know

subtitles.original: The struggles of this scuffed up age,
subtitles.english: The struggles of this scuffed up age,

subtitles.original: We're living in go-sani
subtitles.english: We're living in go-sani

subtitles.original: たくさんの
subtitles.english: Many...

subtitles.original: 経験を糧と
subtitles.english: ...experiences as nourishment,

subtitles.original: この夜明け
subtitles.english: At this dawn,

subtitles.original: 口ずさむわ
subtitles.english: I'll hum a tune.

subtitles.original: Like not your days,
subtitles.english: Like not your days,

subtitles.original: それでも
subtitles.english: Even so,

subtitles.original: あなたを救っていたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to keep saving you.

subtitles.original: Can't find a reason to stay,
subtitles.english: Can't find a reason to stay,

subtitles.original: Some busted world led us astray,
subtitles.english: Some busted world led us astray,

subtitles.original: Once just was left to decay,
subtitles.english: Once just was left to decay,

subtitles.original: We choose to go on anyway.
subtitles.english: We choose to go on anyway.

subtitles.original: Lost in thoughts of an always changing face,
subtitles.english: Lost in thoughts of an always changing face,

subtitles.original: Allies and friends hiding more than one space,
subtitles.english: Allies and friends hiding more than one space,

subtitles.original: Not really surprising, why are you compromising?
subtitles.english: Not really surprising, why are you compromising?

subtitles.original: The sun is rising, a new horizon,
subtitles.english: The sun is rising, a new horizon,

subtitles.original:
With friendships acting like lies and the knives in your back,
so what are you prioritizing?
subtitles.english:
With friendships acting like lies and the knives in your back,
so what are you prioritizing?

subtitles.original: You aren't sick of crying?
subtitles.english: You aren't sick of crying?

subtitles.original: See, I don't buy it,
subtitles.english: See, I don't buy it,

subtitles.original: But here we are hanging on, fighting strong as spiders.
subtitles.english: But here we are hanging on, fighting strong as spiders.

subtitles.original: 儚いじゃないわ しきれない
subtitles.english: It's not fleeting, I can't finish it,

subtitles.original: もう目ぇ閉じてしまいたい
subtitles.english: I want to just close my eyes already,

subtitles.original: 暗いの世界
subtitles.english: In this dark world.

subtitles.original: The cynical mind says why'd you try?
subtitles.english: The cynical mind says why'd you try?

subtitles.original: Why not give up and play the bad guy?
subtitles.english: Why not give up and play the bad guy?

subtitles.original: Why not give up and play the bad guy?
subtitles.english: Why not give up and play the bad guy?

subtitles.original: わかってるさ
subtitles.english: I know.

subtitles.original: 埃まみれの街で
subtitles.english: In this dust-covered town,

subtitles.original: あなたの溜息の影
subtitles.english: The shadow of your sigh,

subtitles.original: 私の傘をないで
subtitles.english: Don't take away my umbrella,

subtitles.original: 抱きしめたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to hold you close.

subtitles.original: We choose to know
subtitles.english: We choose to know

subtitles.original: The struggles of this scuffed up age,
subtitles.english: The struggles of this scuffed up age,

subtitles.original: We're giving in go-sani
subtitles.english: We're giving in go-sani

subtitles.original: 汚れだって
subtitles.english: Even if it's dirty,

subtitles.original: It really hurts to grow,
subtitles.english: It really hurts to grow,

subtitles.original: Believing in a world of fate is overrated,
subtitles.english: Believing in a world of fate is overrated,

subtitles.original: までも
subtitles.english: Even...

subtitles.original: あなたを美しく謳うから
subtitles.english: ...so, I will sing of you beautifully.

subtitles.original: Must be something surreal,
subtitles.english: Must be something surreal,

subtitles.original: And in this dream we can heal,
subtitles.english: And in this dream we can heal,

subtitles.original: This busted world built up real,
subtitles.english: This busted world built up real,

subtitles.original: Someone remember the way it feels,
subtitles.english: Someone remember the way it feels,

subtitles.original: Like night the city feels dead but like...
subtitles.english: Like night the city feels dead but like...

subtitles.original: The lights and sights and sounds are treasures.
subtitles.english: The lights and sights and sounds are treasures.

subtitles.original: こんな世界に
subtitles.english: In a world like this,

subtitles.original: 抗って歩く
subtitles.english: I'll keep walking and resisting,

subtitles.original: 力なんてさ
subtitles.english: The strength for that...

subtitles.original: 私にはないけど
subtitles.english: ...is something I don't have, but...

subtitles.original: Face up, this world can kill the inspired,
subtitles.english: Face up, this world can kill the inspired,

subtitles.original: Why don't we turn this scuffed up page?
subtitles.english: Why don't we turn this scuffed up page?

subtitles.original: We're writing in
subtitles.english: We're writing in

subtitles.original: こんな世界じゃ
subtitles.english: In a world like this,

subtitles.original: Believe in the logic we know,
subtitles.english: Believe in the logic we know,

subtitles.original: Kono yoake is rarely fair,
subtitles.english: Kono yoake is rarely fair,

subtitles.original: Decide your fate, it's your life,
subtitles.english: Decide your fate, it's your life,

subtitles.original: あなたを美しく謳うから
subtitles.english: Because I will sing of you beautifully.

subtitles.original: Tomorrow's a brand new day,
subtitles.english: Tomorrow's a brand new day,

subtitles.original: Like all those optimists say,
subtitles.english: Like all those optimists say,

subtitles.original: But the truth is rather ruthless, it might be rain,
subtitles.english: But the truth is rather ruthless, it might be rain,

subtitles.original: The question is will you bear the pain?
subtitles.english: The question is will you bear the pain?

subtitles.original: What's your reason to stay?
subtitles.english: What's your reason to stay?

subtitles.original: This shining world led us astray,
subtitles.english: This shining world led us astray,

subtitles.original: Won't leave it all to decay,
subtitles.english: Won't leave it all to decay,

subtitles.original: I choose to love it anyway.
subtitles.english: I choose to love it anyway.
